object.name: hammer sledge grey
object.description: The ground cracks under the weight of a grey hammer lying here.

extra_description.description: This massive hammer is incredibly hard, heavy, and utterly grey and featureless.

object.name: scroll violet
object.description: A rolled piece of violet parchment lies on the floor.

extra_description.description: The scroll is written on soft violet parchment that has a pleasing smell to it.

object.name: tablet scroll black
object.description: Lying on the ground is a jet black stone tablet.

extra_description.description:
The tablet is an unreflective black rectangular piece of stone, with strange
                     |writings etched deep into its surface.

object.name: scroll githyanki
object.short_descr: a scroll with githyanki writings on it
object.description: You see a scroll written in an alien tongue.

extra_description.description: The scroll has writings on it that you cannot comprehend.

object.name: amulet demon
object.description: A small amulet lies here in the dirt.

extra_description.description:
The amulet is a small circular object made from some bizarre metallic alloy.
                     |It is inscribed with various symbols and raised images of snakes, tortured
                     |victims, and other things too horrible to describe.
                     |
                     |Stenciled in the center is an unpronounceable name which it would behoove you
                     |not to utter aloud.

object.name: talisman devilish
object.description: On the ground is a small talisman which radiates a tangible evil.

extra_description.description:
The talisman is a red circular stone object hanging from a metallic chain.  It
                     |seems to pulse with a life of its own, and you feel uncomfortable being anywhere
                     |near it.
                     |
                     |Engraved in the center is one word.  Merely reading the word induces fright.

object.name: knife silvery
object.description: A flat-bladed silvery knife lies here.

extra_description.description:
The knife is forged from a strange silvery metal the likes of which you have
                     |never seen in your own world.  It is incredibly sharp and hard, yet feels almost
                     |fluid to the touch.

object.name: dagger silvery
object.description: A sharp-looking silvery dagger lies here.

extra_description.description:
The dagger is forged from a strange silvery metal the likes of which you have
                     |never seen in your own world.  It is incredibly sharp and hard, yet feels almost
                     |fluid to the touch.

object.name: sword thin
object.short_descr: an extremely sharp and thin sword
object.description: Light glints off the edge of a razor-sharp sword.

extra_description.description:
The sword is forged from a strange silvery metal.  It barely measures an inch
                     |across at its widest point, yet it is totally inflexible and razor-sharp.  It
                     |could probably cut through stone.

object.name: sword thin two two-handed
object.description: A heavy yet thinly bladed two-handed sword lies here.

extra_description.description:
The sword is forged from a strange silvery metal.  It barely measures two inches
                     |across at its widest point, yet it is totally inflexible and razor sharp.  It
                     |could probably cut through stone.

object.name: sword silvery two-handed
object.description: A silvery sword gleams unnaturally with an alien light.

extra_description.description:
The sword is forged from a strange silvery metal the likes of which you have
                     |never seen in your own world.  It is incredibly sharp and hard, yet feels almost
                     |fluid to the touch.

object.name: flail barbed iron
object.description: A rusty iron flail with wicked barbs on it tears at the ground.

extra_description.description:
This hideous weapon has claimed many lives.  You can tell from the bloodstains
                     |dried into the iron and from the residue of flesh that hangs from the many
                     |barbs on it.

object.name: sword gith two-handed
object.short_descr: the unholy sword of the githyanki
object.description: You feel tendrils of evil emanating from a wicked blade.

extra_description.description:
The blade of this sword is a featureless gray.  As you touch it you feel an
                     |evil presence reaching out to consume your soul.
                     |
                     |Maybe picking it up wasn't such a good idea.

object.name: stone flame
object.description: The room is lit by a hot blue flame coming from a small stone.

extra_description.description:
This stone burns with an flame that emits great heat, yet it can be held with
                     |ease.  The flame creates a light that allows you to see for miles.

object.name: powder astral
object.description: Twinkling powder floats before your eyes.

extra_description.description: You see the residue of the astral plane.

object.name: vest splint
object.description: An intricately fashioned splint mail vest lies here.

extra_description.description:
This splint mail has been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest
                     |quality of steels.

object.name: skirt splint
object.description: An intricately fashioned splint mail skirt lies here.

extra_description.description:
This splint mail has been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest
                     |quality of steels.

object.name: sleeves splint
object.short_descr: a pair of splint mail sleeves
object.description: A pair of intricately fashioned splint mail sleeves lie here.

extra_description.description:
This splint mail has been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest
                     |quality of steels.

object.name: gauntlets ornate
object.short_descr: a pair of ornately designed gauntlets
object.description: A pair of painstakingly designed ornate gauntlets lie here.

extra_description.description:
These gauntlets have been expertly and ornately fashioned from the highest
                     |quality of steels.

object.name: vest cracked leather
object.short_descr: a decaying vest made from cracked leather
object.description: A decaying hunk of cracked leather has been discarded here.

extra_description.description:
The ancient vest is barely intact.  All of the leather has cracked and dried
                     |to a husk.  It is covered with stains, burns, scorch marks, and blood.

object.name: potion violet
object.description: A tall glass flask holds a translucent violet fluid.

extra_description.description: The violet fluid inside shifts and swirls.

object.name: potion vial murky
object.description: A small vial contains a murky, sludge-like substance.

extra_description.description: The murky liquid inside this vial looks a lot like sewer water.

object.name: potion silvery
object.description: An octagonal vial holds a silvery-colored fluid that reflects light.

extra_description.description: The octagonal vial contains a silvery-colored liquid that shimmers in the light.

object.name: mint chocolate
object.description: Someone has dropped a delicious-looking chocolate mint here.

extra_description.description:
This mint is made from the finest of chocolates, surrounding a cool peppermint
                     |interior that must be savored, not swallowed.

object.name: pentagram
object.description: A small black metal pentagram has been left here.

extra_description.description:
The pentagram is a small circular hoop that surrounds a five-pointed star.
                     |Inscribed on its exterior loop are markings in an alien tongue.

object.name: pouch rotting
object.description: A small pouch rots away on the floor here.

extra_description.description: You think you see glints of metal through the holes...
